articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Work for Developing Rungra Pleasure Ground for People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Work for Developing Rungra Pleasure Ground for People
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, provided field guidance to the work for developing the Rungra Pleasure Ground for People.
					 He was accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					
					 The Rungra Pleasure Ground for People covering an area of nearly 100 hectares consists of the Rungra Dolphin Aquarium, Rungra Wading Pool, Rungra Funfair, etc. 
					
					 The first leg of his visit was the construction site of the Rungra Dolphin Aquarium.
					
					 The aquarium has a building area of 5 980 square meters and a total plottage of 14 940 square meters with 1 460 seats. It is an aquarium for aquatic creature equipped with adequate welfare and service facilities for watching performance of dolphins including a water tank of nearly 3 000 cubic meters for performance, 16 auxiliary water tanks, room for scientific and technological knowledge and soft drink stands.
					
					 He went round the interior and exterior of the aquarium to learn in detail about its construction.
					
					 He highly appreciated the laudable feats soldier-builders performed by completing in the main the vast project for the construction of the aquarium in a matter of less than a year.
					
					 Walking round the water tank for performance, auxiliary tanks, room for scientific and technological knowledge and other construction fields, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that it has become possible to provide the people with another modern and peculiar centre for their cultural and emotional life.
					
					 He set forth tasks to be fulfilled to complete the construction in best quality.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the construction site of the Rungra Wading Pool.
					
					 The pool consists of water slide with four tracks 18 meters high and more than one hundred meters long, a shower bath site, soft drink stands, dressing room, etc. 
					
					 He was very pleased to picture to himself the happy school youth and children and working people who will laugh boisterously while fully enjoying wading at the wading pool when completed on the occasion of the day of the victory in the war.
					
					 He underlined the need to add a diving tower and different service facilities to the area around the wading pool so that it may be a cultural recreation place for people which will remain impeccable even in the distant future.
					
					 He also went round the Rungra Funfair.
					
					 It consists of two districts -- a variety of amusement facilities such as mad mouse, nose diving tower, octopus merry-go-round, temptation merry-go-round, flying cycle and various service facilities.
					
					 Making the rounds of various places of the first and second districts of the funfair, he acquainted himself in detail with its construction.
					
					 He kindly told about the need to make a new passage so that visitors may come and go to the funfair divided into the two districts and to build soft drink stands in a more fashionable style to their convenience.
					
					 He also learned about the progress made in the embankment project of Rungra Islet to protect the Rungra Pleasure Ground for People from flood damage.
					
					 While giving field guidance to the work for the development of the pleasure ground, he set forth important tasks for turning Rungra Islet into the pleasure ground for people including the way of satisfactorily easing strain on traffic, the measure to make a comprehensive use of the River Taedong and the issue arising in light decoration.
					
					 The pleasure ground is a gift to be presented by the WPK to the people, he said, adding that it should be wound up by the day of the victory in the war this significant year.
					
					 Noting that grand monumental edifices startling the world such as the Rungra Pleasure Ground for People are springing up one after another across the country under the wise leadership of the WPK, he stressed the need to build more structures to suit the people's idea and feelings, aesthetic taste and demand.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Writer
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spread to Writer
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Song Chan Ung, writer of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea, on his 80th birthday.
					 Born in a poor peasant's family in Kangso County (at that time), South Phyongan Province in April, 1932, he graduated from Kim Il Sung University and began his career as a writer under the care of President Kim Il Sung after the liberation of the country.
					
					 He took part in creating art works including revolutionary operas such as "Song of Mt. Kumgang" and "Under Warm Sunshine" and music and dance tale "Song of Paradise" in the course of growing up as a talented writer under the warm care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He created a lot of words of songs including "Let Us Hold High the Red Flag" and "Song of Ten-point Political Programme," contributing to developing the DPRK's poetic literature and educating the people in a revolutionary manner.
					
					 He was awarded high state commendations including a watch bearing the august name of Kim Il Sung and Kim Il Sung Prize.

articles.title: Greetings to Queen of Netherlands
articles.content:
Greetings to Queen of Netherlands
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to Queen of Netherlands Beatrix on April 26 on the occasion of its national day. 
					 Kim Yong Nam sincerely wished Netherlands development and prosperity.

articles.title: Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Iranian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Morteza Moradian, Iranian ambassador to the DPRK, hosted a reception at his embassy on Monday on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly, Pak Ui Chun, foreign minister of the DPRK, Jong Yong Su, minister of Labor, Kim Jong Suk, chairwoman of the DPRK Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Iranian embassy were present there.
					
					 The Iranian ambassador said at the reception that HE President Kim Il Sung clearly indicated the road of the country's liberation and development and prosperity and wisely led the revolutionary struggle of the popular masses. 
					
					 It was under the wise leadership of the President that the Korean people could achieve progress and prosperity, foiling the threat and blackmail of the hostile forces and their sanctions, he noted, and continued:
					
					 The Islamic Republic of Iran will continue to support the Korean people in their struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country and the gains of the revolution and achieve its reunification.  
					
					 Choe Thae Bok in his speech said Iranian friends' celebration of the Day of the Sun, the great national holiday, together with the Korean people constitutes a manifestation of the deepest reverence for President Kim Il Sung and strong encouragement to the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 He expressed firm support and solidarity for the Iranian government and people in their struggle to resolutely oppose and reject any form of sanctions and moves of military threats and blackmails by the hostile forces and to defend the right to nuclear activities for peaceful purpose. 
					
					 The immortal exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the development of the friendly relations between the DPRK and Iran and accomplishment of the human cause of independence will last forever.

articles.title: Great Men's Histories Lauded by Director-general of IIJI
articles.content:
Great Men's Histories Lauded by Director-general of IIJI
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The idea and cause of the great President Kim Il Sung were successfully carried forward by leader Kim Jong Il. Vishwanath, secretary general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, said this after visiting the DPRK recently.
					 Expressing his boundless reverence for the peerlessly great men, he said: 
					
					 Kim Jong Il conducted all activities as intended by the President.
					
					 He was a great thinker and theoretician and a political elder who glorified the Juche idea as a guiding idea in the era of independence and led the struggle for independence and socialism against imperialism to victory.
					
					 He propounded the idea and theory of the Songun politics, paving a new way for forming independent forces in our era and accomplishing the cause of socialism.
					
					 Progressive mankind will never forget the great exploits performed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The history of the great men shines thanks to a great succession.  
					
					 Rosy is the future of the Korean people thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un who personified the brilliant wisdom, outstanding leadership and noble virtues of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un, idea, cause and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will shine for all ages and victory and glory are in store for progressive mankind.

articles.title: Nampho-Pyongyang Seawater Pipeline Project Completed
articles.content:
Nampho-Pyongyang Seawater Pipeline Project Completed
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Nampho-Pyongyang seawater pipeline project was completed in the DPRK.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il unrolled a plan to bring seawater from Nampho to Pyongyang for solving the issue of drinking water for the citizens of the capital city and providing good conditions for their cultural and emotional life. When its first phase project was wound up, he showed deep loving care and trust in the model units, officials and other working people engaged in the project.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un acquainted himself with the second phase project of the Nampho-Pyongyang seawater pipeline in December last year and clearly indicated the orientation and ways for completing the project on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Officials and other working people, scientists and technicians carried out vast tasks for laying pipelines extending more than dozens of km and constructing seawater reservoir, pond and pumping stations in a matter of one year.
					
					 The completion of the project makes it possible to bring great benefit to the country by disinfecting water by seawater and satisfactorily supply seawater to the Pyongyang Dolphin Aquarium and the Aquarium in the Central Zoo and thus contribute to the cultural and emotional life of the people.
					
					 A commissioning ceremony was held in Waudo District, Nampho City on Monday.
					
					 Addressing the ceremony, Choe Yong Rim, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet, said that the seawater pipeline is a valuable fruition of Kim Jong Il's idea of believing in people as in Heaven and Kim Jong Un's noble view on the people and a laudable structure demonstrating the spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 He underscored the need to successfully manage and operate the pipeline and thus make a positive contribution to providing better living conditions to the citizens of the capital city.
					
					 The participants went round the seawater intake pump station after being briefed on the roadmap of the pipeline.

articles.title: National Sports Contest of Workers Opens
articles.content:
National Sports Contest of Workers Opens
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A national sports contest of workers opened on the occasion of May Day.
					 The participants will compete in football and field and track events.
					
					 An opening ceremony was held at Yanggakdo Football Stadium on Monday.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony, football and field and track events took place.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize National Sports Festival Closes
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize National Sports Festival Closes
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize National Sports Festival was closed with due ceremony at the Table-Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Monday. The festival was opened on April 6 on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Good successes were achieved in several events including shooting, swimming, weightlifting and track-and-field during the festival.
					
					 Men and women players of April 25 National Defence Sports Team renewed world and Asia records in shooting events and set national records in shooting, swimming, weightlifting and track-and-field events.
					
					 Men and women players of the April 25 Sports Team won both football and basketball games by applying high-speed tactics based on collectivism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech, Guidelines for National Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Congratulatory Speech, Guidelines for National Reunification
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un made a congratulatory speech at the military parade celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung held in Pyongyang on the Day of the Sun (Apr. 15).
					 His speech has enjoyed great public response as it is vibrant with superb intelligence and iron will and gives clear-cut answers to questions arising in building a thriving nation.
					
					 In particular, his statement that "Our party and the government of the DPRK will join hands with anyone who sincerely wishes the reunification of the country and peace and prosperity of the nation, and make responsible and persevering efforts to realize the historic cause of national reunification" instills in the minds of all Koreans the conviction of sure victory in national reunification.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was evidently a reminder of President Kim Il Sung, who called for national unity before anything else and led all patriotic-minded Koreans to the efforts for national reunification.
					
					 This statement also made people recall leader Kim Jong Il, who declared that the DPRK would join hands under the banner of great national unity with government authorities or ruling and opposition party officials, conglomerators and army generals, if they value the common interests of the nation and want national reunification.
					
					 The idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on great national unity and their lofty personalities and patriotism served as a source of strength enabling all Koreans to turn out in the drive for national unity and reunification.
					
					 All the Korean people have keenly felt that Kim Jong Un, fully identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is the lodestar of national reunification as well as the sun of the nation.

articles.title: DPRK Scientists Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Work
articles.content:
DPRK Scientists Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Work
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- "Let Us Hold Great Comrade Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as General Secretary of Our Party Forever and Successfully Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche", a celebrated work published by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, has inspired the scientists in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to make positive contributions to the nation's economic development and people's wellbeing with signal achievements in science and technology.
					 Pak Un Chol, section chief of the Mechanical Engineering Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, told KCNA:
					
					 "The work calls for giving priority to science and technology, timely applying sci-tech achievements in production and establishing the habit of scientifically solving all economic bottlenecks, thereby putting the nation's economic development on a scientific basis. 
					
					 Now we are making field researches at the February 8 Vinalon Complex to help solve sci-tech problems.
					
					 In the spirit of exploration and creation displayed by workers in Ryonha who brought about drastic progress in CNC machine tools production, we will make a big contribution to putting the country's overall technological equipment on a higher level."
					
					 Noting that scientists and technicians have a big role to play in turning the nation into a knowledge-based economic power, Ra Un Gyong, a researcher at the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science, said:
					
					 "I will regard leader Kim Jong Il's teachings 'Look out at the world with one's feet planted on one's own land' as my lifelong motto and make more inventions conducive to developing the nation's light industry."

articles.title: Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Coal miners in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have been making fresh innovations in coal output in the spirit of making revenge upon the rat-like Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea.
					 Driven by the hatred for the group which dared defame again the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, they put up such placards and posters at their worksites as "Shower fire of revenge on the Lee Myung Bak swarm of rats!" and "Wipe out the Lee Myung Bak swarm of rats from this land!"
					
					 Coal mines under the Pukchang Area Coal Mining Complex, including the Inpho Coal Mine, scored a record-high speed in tunneling.
					
					 The Kaechon Area Coal Mining Complex has channeled efforts into developing deep coal fields in Pongchon and Joyang coal mines, paving a way for drastically increased production.
					
					 Hukryong, Toksan and Ryongnam coal mines under the Kangdong Area Coal Mining Complex, abundant in deposits and boasted of good tunneling conditions, are over-fulfilling their daily quotas by giving full play to their existing capacity.
					
					 Chonnae and Myongchon area coal mining complexes have expanded mining fields through collective innovations.

articles.title: Jumunjin Naval Battle, Unprecedented in War History
articles.content:
Jumunjin Naval Battle, Unprecedented in War History
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the dear respected Kim Jong Un made an inspection tour of a naval unit of the Korean People's Army.
					 During the tour, he praised the unit for its feats in sinking U.S. heavy cruiser "Baltimore" with only four torpedo boats in a naval battle off Jumunjin during the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953).
					
					 The naval battle took place in July 1950.
					
					 At that time, the second torpedo-boat flotilla was given an order to contain U.S. warships likely to intrude into the sea off Jumunjin, when the KPA troops were overpowering the enemies on the ground, thanks to the illustrious command of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The U.S. warships included a heavy cruiser, a light cruiser, destroyer and other battle vessels.
					
					 But, the torpedo boats dashed towards the enemy's warships under the shower of shells and bullets.
					
					 Torpedoes hit the heavy cruiser, a flagship, sinking it, and attacked other vessels.
					
					 Thus, the battle ended in the victory for the KPA.

articles.title: Scandals of Lee Myung Bak Confidants under Fire
articles.content:
Scandals of Lee Myung Bak Confidants under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on April 25 carried an editorial titled "Mean and ugly nature of heavyweights of Lee Myung Bak regime."
					 Scandals of heavyweights of the present regime, confidants of Lee Myung Bak, are being disclosed one after another these days, the editorial said, and continued:
					
					 Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and Communication Committee, received a huge amount of money from a development company on several occasions in return for supporting it while a former vice-minister of Knowledge and Economy was involved in this scandal. And truth of other scams including illegal investigation, fabrication of stock is being probed, it noted.
					
					 It accused Lee Sang Duk, elder brother of Lee Myung Bak, of receiving hundreds of millions of won, sparking off public uproar. The editorial also slammed Lee Myung Bak for crying out for victory in "the presidential" election, while wining and dinning with Park Geun Hye on April 24.
					
					 This is a mean and ugly sight, indeed, the editorial said, calling for sternly punishing those involved in the scandals.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Encroaching upon People's Interests
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Encroaching upon People's Interests
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an editorial on April 25 condemning the "government" authorities for encroaching upon the interests of the people.
					 The editorial accused the U.S. government of announcing that it would continue beef export though a cow infected with mad cow disease was found in the U.S. recently.
					
					 Intolerable is the U.S. attitude of seeking its interests only regardless of others, the editorial said.
					
					 The sale of American beef that was halted at department stores and other places of south Korea indicates the seriousness of the development, it noted, accusing the "government" of not taking any measure.
					
					 This casts skepticism as to whether it prioritizes people's health or the U.S. interests, it deplored.
					
					 The candlelight actions against the import of American beef that swept across south Korea in 2008 were attributable to the present regime's irresponsible attitude of shelving the issue of people's health, it noted, stressing:
					
					 The "government" should never forget this.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Abuse of Power under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Abuse of Power under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea held a press conference in front of the building of the Minimum Wage Committee on April 27 lashing out at the "government" authorities for their abuse of power.
					 At the conference the speakers accused the Ministry of Employment and Labor of unilaterally giving the post of a member of the committee in charge of the issue of minimum wage of workers to Kukmin Rochong.
					
					 The organization lost its qualifications as it is criticized for being "MB Rochong" after being cooked up by the "government" involvement.
					
					 They accused the "government" of using as a political lever the issues of improving the living standard of low-paid workers and eradicating bi-polarization of society by putting forward the above-said organization.
					
					 We will take counteractions against the power abuse by Lee Myung Bak and the minister of Employment and Labor, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Police Suppression of Housewife Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Suppression of Housewife Slammed
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Security Investigation Group of the Suwon Police Station of south Korea on April 27 suppressed a housewife who conducted the activities for people's correct understanding of the DPRK.
					 Calling into question the activities she conducted to bring the people to the situation of the north through Internet, the fascist police searched her house on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" and confiscated documents related to the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					
					 Commenting on this, a lawyer dismissed the police crackdown as a despicable act prompted by its intention to attain actual results before the end of the term of the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 A pro-reunification personage said that the public security authorities' acts of incriminating people on ungrounded charges signal the ruin of confrontation-minded regime.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuses in S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The authorities' human rights abuses were recently disclosed in south Korea to spark off strong social furor. 
					 When a prisoner allegedly involved in the conspiratorial university lecturer spy case ended his meeting with his family last year, fascist maniacs of Jonju Prison forced him to strip himself naked under the pretext of finding out prohibited things. 
					
					 The prisoner declared he could not repress indignation and hatred against the "government" which stoops to any human rights abuse after unreasonably detaining him on charge of espionage. 
					
					 He said that what he did was nothing but the visit to the north legally paid by him on the basis of understanding that national reunification is important for him, a member of the nation. 
					
					 For this he was put under absurd charge of being a spy and forced to leave his family and society and now is denied even elementary human right, he protested. 
					
					 Recalling that Chosun Ilbo and other conservative media are busy releasing malignant misinformation about his espionage, he declared this is absolutely intolerable. 
					
					 The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and various other organizations held a press conference outside Jonju Prison to denounce the human rights abuse on April 20 and demanded the authorities release prisoners of conscience and repeal the inhumane "security law."

articles.title: Candlelight Action Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Action Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A candlelight action was staged at Chonggye Square, Seoul on April 27 to denounce the puppet Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who blustered it would continue to import American beef despite the recent occurrence of mad cow disease in the U.S.
					 The youth and children who turned out in the candlelight action against the import of American beef in 2008 denounced the "government" for not taking any measure though the people's lives are threatened by reoccurrence of mad cow disease in the U.S.
					
					 They assailed Lee Myung Bak for remaining utterly indifferent to the health of the people, regarding the relations with the U.S. more important than it.
					
					 They declared that they would wage a widespread candlelight struggle against the present regime keen on meeting only the interests of the Lee group, paying no heed to the people's voices.
					
					 Then they demanded the authorities stop the import of the American beef at once.

articles.title: DPRK's Steps to Punish Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Supported in Benin, Russia
articles.content:
DPRK's Steps to Punish Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Supported in Benin, Russia
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Benin issued a statement on April 23 in support of the notice of the special operation action group of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement resolutely denounced the Lee Myung Bak group's act of maliciously hurting again the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK as an insult to it and world progressive mankind.
					
					 The statement expressed full support for the notice of the special operation action group of the Supreme Command of the KPA that the special actions would start to meet the challenge of Lee Myung Bak group to cope with the evermore grave developments.
					
					 Political parties of Russia released statements on April 25 to denounce the Lee group of traitors for its hideous provocations.
					
					 The Executive Committee of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia reaffirmed its political support for the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, condemning puppet Lee Myung Bak's undisguised racket kicked off under the patronage of the U.S. as a treacherous and immoral criminal act which can never be justified.
					
					 The statement called upon the world progressive public desirous of peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula to put pressure upon the south Korean authorities to stop such provocation.
					
					 The National Salvation Front of Russia fully supported the resolute stand clarified in the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry as regards the criminal acts of puppet Lee Myung Bak. It demanded the south Korean authorities stop at once the sinister political provocations against the leadership and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Colorful events were held in different countries between April 7 and 18 on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun. They included an Internet seminar of political parties and organizations of East Europe and Central Asian countries in Russia, a national seminar on the Juche idea in Uganda, celebration meetings, remembrance meetings, round-table talks, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Iran, Nepal, India, Palestine, Syria and Lesotho and Taekwon-Do tournaments in Bulgaria and South Africa.
					 Displayed in their venues were famous works of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and photos of the revolutionary careers and undying revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 The participants in the Internet seminar in Russia praised the undying feats the President performed for the prosperity of the country and national reunification. They deeply explained and proved the essence of the Juche idea and its validity and great vitality.
					
					 The chief of the Juche Idea Study Group of the Department of Psychology of the Kyambogo University Kampala, Uganda and other speakers praised the President as the outstanding thinker and theoretician who founded the original Juche idea and indicated the way of independence, prosperity and progress for mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party said at a meeting that the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes is a just cause of building a thriving socialist nation and an exercise of the legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The principal of Indrafrasta National School of India in a lecture noted that though the DPRK is not a large country in its territory and population but has a tremendous might which no one dares provoke.
					
					 A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at tournament for innovation of the African Taekwon-Do Federation in South Africa.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Different Parts of Japan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Different Parts of Japan
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Japan held celebrations of the birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Il Sung in different parts of Japan. 
					 A celebration was held in Ibaragi Prefecture on April 22.
					
					 Ri Yong Hun, chairman of the Ibaragi Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), said that Koreans of the elder generation made a history of the Ibaragi movement of Koreans in Japan, underscoring the need for the younger generation to firmly hold the baton of patriotism carrying forward their will under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An art performance celebrating the Day of the Sun was given by students and teachers of Korean primary and middle school in Ibaragi.
					
					 Colorful events including "Let's sing of pride of compatriots in Ibaragi" on the same day convinced the compatriots in the prefecture of a bright future of the prospering Korean society. 
					
					 A grand festival of compatriots in Yamaguchi Prefecture and a flower event of compatriots in Central Nishi Tokyo took place at Korean primary and middle school in Yamaguchi and Korean primary and middle school No. 1 in Nishi Tokyo on April 15 on the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Foreign Media Carry Special Write-ups on Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Foreign Media Carry Special Write-ups on Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers and magazines carried special write-ups on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Nepali paper Arpan on April 20 carried an article titled "With the Century" illustrated with a photo of the President.
					
					 "With the Century" is the title of the reminiscences of the President, the great man in the 20th century, the paper said, adding that it shows well the extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom and noble virtues of the President as a great man in the century.
					
					 The Indian paper New Delhi Times on April 13 edited several articles under the title "On the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung" illustrated with the portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 In an article titled "Among the people" the paper said that "Among the People", a collection of reminiscences written by people from all walks of life in the DPRK, has been widely disseminated, carried in many papers and magazines and published in booklet in different countries. This is a special privilege only the President can enjoy as he made a history of victory and glory by making long journeys to mix with people all his life and is always alive in their hearts, the paper stressed.
					
					 The April issue of the Palestinian magazine Ilal Amam carried a special write-up titled "On the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung: founder and distinguished leader of powerful Korea" with the portraits of the smiling President and smiling leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Russian papers also carried special write-ups accompanied with the above-said portraits and photos of Kim Jong Un and photos of the revolutionary activities of the great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Patriot No. 14, the April 6-9 issue of Pravda, We Serve the Country No. 3, Veteran No. 14, the April 6 issue of Tsumenskaya Pravda and the April 12 issue of Amurskaya Pravda introduced in detail the great career and undying feats of the President who devoted his whole life to the happiness of the people, regarding it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of UK Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of UK Organization
Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on April 21 posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".
					The work, published on April 18, 1998, clarifies the five-point policy of great national unity that serves as important guidelines for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Cuba Condemns U.S. False Propaganda against It
articles.content:
Cuba Condemns U.S. False Propaganda against It
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Cuban representative at the UN, addressing a recent session of the UN general assembly, vehemently condemned the U.S. continued false propaganda against it.
					 He accused the U.S. of distorting the history and reality of Cuba over its illegally operated radio and TV broadcasting services, adding that a total of 26 320 hours were devoted to its anti-Cuba programs last year alone.
					
					 This is a violation of international law and the norms and regulations of the International Telecommunication Union, he noted, adding that Cuba is opposed to the misuse of media for destabilizing other countries, infringing upon sovereignty and interfering in their internal affairs.

articles.title: Iran's Representative at UN Refutes Israel's Absurd Assertion
articles.content:
Iran's Representative at UN Refutes Israel's Absurd Assertion
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA)  ? Iran's permanent representative at the United Nations Mohammad Khazaee, addressing a meeting of the UNSC on April 25, said Israel's remarks describing Iran's peaceful nuclear activities as a nuclear weapon development are an attempt to deviate the international public opinion from secret expansion of its nuclear arsenal. 
					 He said the Zionist regime owns hundreds of nuclear warheads and other kinds of mass killing weapons which are all illegal and threaten the international peace and security, adding that Iran will make positive efforts to ensure global peace and stability.

articles.title: Abbas: No Peace with Israel before Prisoners Freed
articles.content:
Abbas: No Peace with Israel before Prisoners Freed
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- The Palestinian National Authority will not sign any peace deal with Israel before the latter releases all Palestinian prisoners, Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas said in a statement Friday.
					 Abbas emphasized the release of prisoners who were arrested before Israel and Palestine Liberation Organization signed the Oslo peace accord in 1993.
					
					 His remarks came as the Palestinians staged demonstrations in the Gaza Strip and the West Bank in solidarity with hundreds of detainees who went on a hunger strike, some of whom for more than a month.

articles.title: Palestinian Protester Hurt by Israeli Tear Gas Canister
articles.content:
Palestinian Protester Hurt by Israeli Tear Gas Canister
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A tear gas canister, fired by Israeli soldiers on West Bank protesters, injured a Palestinian youth in the face, medical sources and witnesses said Friday. 
					 Witnesses said that Israeli soldiers fired rubber bullets and tear gas grenades to disperse the villagers protesting the building of the West Bank barrier and the expansion of settlements.
					
					 The incident took place in Kafar Qadoum village near Qalqilya city.

articles.title: Taliban Attack Kills NATO Soldier in Afghanistan
articles.content:
Taliban Attack Kills NATO Soldier in Afghanistan
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Taliban attack claimed the life of a soldier with the NATO-led International Security Assistance Force in the southern region of Afghanistan on Friday.
					 More than 130 NATO soldiers with 88 of them Americans have been killed in the conflict-ridden Afghanistan so far this year.

articles.title: Economic Depression in U.S., Japan
articles.content:
Economic Depression in U.S., Japan
 Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- U.S. oil giant Exxon Mobil said Thursday its earnings fell 11 percent in the first quarter of this year as compared with previous year.
					 Kyocera Corp. of Japan said Thursday its group net profit in fiscal 2011 ending March fell 32.3 percent from a year earlier to 82.90 billion yen.
					
					 Nintendo Co. said Thursday it posted its first-ever group net loss of 43.20 billion yen in fiscal 2011.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre 26a exhibicion de ciencias y tecnicas militares
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre 26a exhibicion de ciencias y tecnicas militares
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio la XXVI exhibicion de las ciencias y tecnicas militares del EPC.
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Son Chol Ju, Pak Jae Gyong, Kim Yong Chol, Ri Jae Il, Kim Myong Guk, Yun Tong Hyon, Jon Chang Bok y Pak Jong Chon.
					
					Ante todo, Kim Jong Un hizo conocimiento del estado de reconstruccion del Pabellon de las Ciencias y Tecnicas del EPC.
					
					Evaluo altamente a los constructores militares por haber reconstruido excelentemente el pabellon al realizar cualitativamente con las fuerzas y tecnologias propias la obra del exterior y el interior tomando en cuenta las peculiaridades del establecimiento de ese tipo.
					
					Se mostro satisfecho de que gracias a la modernizacion del pabellon a la altura de la epoca del Songun, se haya preparado una base importante para introducir de modo activo los logros de ciencias y tecnicas militares que se desarrollan por la iniciativa directa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y por la destacada guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Guiado por los funcionarios, el Comandante Supremo dio vuelta por varios puntos de la exhibicion en el primer y segundo pisos y al aire libre y averiguo en detalles como marchan los trabajos cientifico-tecnicos en el EPC.
					
					Es muy loable que los cientificos, tecnicos e investigadores del EPC hayan expuesto en la ocasion muchos inventos valiosos e imprescindibles a la preparacion de combate del EPC, desarrollados con la inteligencia colectiva e iniciativas creativas, dijo.
					
					Subrayo que al ver las invenciones exhibidas, pudo comprender que en pleno acato a la voluntad del partido de conquistar la cumbre de la tecnologia, el EPC hace ingentes esfuerzos por solucionar los temas cientificos y tecnicos relacionados con los preparativos de combate.
					
					Recordo que en el pasado los cientificos, tecnicos, investigadores y militares del EPC libraron sin cesar la investigacion cientifica que contribuye al fortalecimiento de la preparacion de combate del EPC y a la mejora de vida de los uniformados y el pueblo, poniendo de manifiesto el ardiente entusiasmo revolucionario y la facultad creadora y elogio reiteradamente los exitos alcanzados por ellos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo dio las preciosas instrucciones para desarrollar la ciencia y la tecnica del EPC conforme a la demanda de nuevo siglo.
					
					Destaco que para superar el nivel de la ciencia y la tecnica militares de talla mundial y desarrollarlas con rapidez, hay que dominar a la perfeccion la ciencia y la tecnica de punta.
					
					Enfatizo que ya que se acondiciono magnificamente el pabellon, se debe realizar regularmente la exposicion al poner por parte las invenciones evaluadas con excelencia en las unidades, las academias a todos niveles y otros dominios.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que la presente exposicion servira de motivo importante que empuje el desarrollo de la ciencia y la tecnica del EPC y contribuya activamente a la mejora de la vida de los uniformados y el pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion magica de Conjunto Circense de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion magica de Conjunto Circense de EPC
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los capitalinos la funcion magica de gran tamano del Conjunto Circense del EPC "Hasta el final del tiempo".
					En la escena se pusieron las magias fantasmagoricas y cinematograficas.
					
					Los magos demostraron sus talentos que traen cambio visual de las cosas existentes en el tiempo y el espacio.
					
					Kim Jong Un presento las tareas que sirven de guia para desarrollar el arte circense Juche que  contribuye a educar ideologica, politica y culturalmente a las personas.
					
					Le acompanaron en verla Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Jong Gak, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Yong Chun, Hyon Chol Hae, Choe Pu Il y Kim Yong Chol, los innovadores laborales de las principales fabricas y empresas en la capital, los profesores e investigadores de las universidades, los funcionarios de municipios y barrios, las ejemplares jefas de unidad de vecinos, secretarios de celulas del partido y otros capitalinos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente libanes
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente libanes
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 25 el presidente de la Republica del Libano, Michel Suleiman.
					La misiva sigue:
					
					Felicito de todo corazon a Usted con motivo del centenario del nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para desear sinceramente que usted conduzca su pais al camino de independencia y progreso y que el pueblo coreano tenga bienestar y paz.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de dirigentes de partido indonesio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de dirigentes de partido indonesio
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviaran el dia 3 Megawati Soekarnoputri, presidenta general del Consejo de Direccion Central del Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia, y su secretario general, Tjahjo Kumolo. 
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con alta consideracion.
					
					Todos los miembros del Consejo de Direccion Central del Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia envian de todo corazon las felicitaciones a Su Excelencia con respecto a que en la IV Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, convocada el 11 de abril de 2012, Su Excelencia  Kim Jong Il fue enaltecido como eterno Secretario General del PTC y Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un fue electo como Primer Secretario del PTC y Presidente de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, segun la unanime conviccion, la aspiracion y la fidelidad de todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular y otros habitantes. 
					
					Le brindamos las mas calidas felicitaciones por su eleccion como Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el V periodo de sesiones de la XII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, efectuado el 13 de abril de 2012 y al mismo tiempo, felicitamos calurosamente el 80o aniversario de la fundacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea que se ha celebrado el 25 de abril de 2012.
					
					Convencidos de que bajo la sabia orientacion de Su Excelencia, el pueblo coreano construira sin falta el Estado prospero, formulamos votos por buena salud y felicidad de Su Excelencia para el bienestar y la prosperidad de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para expresar la esperanza de que en el futuro se intensifiquen mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el Partido Democratico de Lucha de Indonesia y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de familia de hija de Zhou Baozhong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de familia de hija de Zhou Baozhong
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio presente que le dirigiera la familia de Zhou Wei, hija de Zhou Baozhong, chino relacionado con la lucha revolucionaria antijaponesa.
					La hija, de visita en Corea, lo entrego el dia 29 a Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Terminada la construccion de acueducto Nampho-Pyongyang
articles.content:
Terminada la construccion de acueducto Nampho-Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 30 de abril (ACNC) -- Quedo terminada la construccion del acueducto que transporta el agua salada a Pyongyang desde Nampho.
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il tomo la iniciativa de esa obra para solucionar el problema de agua potable de los capitalinos y garantizarles excelentes condiciones de vida cultural.
					
					Cuando termino la primera etapa de la obra, dispenso la gran benevolencia a las unidades, funcionarios y trabajadores ejemplares que participaron en la construccion.
					
					En diciembre de ano pasado, el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un averiguo en detalles como marcha la segunda etapa de la obra y enseno el rumbo y remedios para completarla con motivo del centenario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Dentro de un ano, los funcionarios, trabajadores, cientificos y tecnicos instalaron las tuberias de transporte en un tramo de cientos de ries (10 ri equivalen a 4 kilometros) y cumplieron enormes tareas de construccion como el deposito de agua salada, el estanque de sedimentacion y las estaciones de bombeo, etc.
					
					Gracias a la culminacion de la obra, se hizo posible aportar muchos beneficios al pais al esterilizar con agua salada el agua potable y mejorar la vida cultural de los habitantes al suministrar suficiente agua salada al Acuario de Delfines de Pyongyang y al acuario del Parque Zoologico Nacional.
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar este lunes en el municipio de Waudo de la ciudad de Nampho.
					
					Al pronunciar el discurso de la ocasion, Choe Yong Rim, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, senalo que el acueducto Nampho-Pyongyang es fruto valioso del ideario Inminwichon (considerar al pueblo como el cielo) del Dirigente y de la noble concepcion del pueblo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Deviene igualmente la creacion orgullosa de autoconfianza.
					
					Apunto la necesidad de administrar bien el acueducto para mejorar las condiciones de la vida de la poblacion capitalina.
					
					Luego de escuchar las explicaciones de la vida de acueducto, recorrieron la estacion de bomba.
